Reviews.Title: Check compatable cameras
Reviews.Author: DuWayne
Reviews.Content: Make sure to go to the Level 1 website and check the list of compatible cameras.  This product does not support FOSCAM cameras.

Reviews.Title: NO DRIVES INCLUDED
Reviews.Author: Ronda
Reviews.Content: ALERT ALERT ALERT, This does NOT include any actual drives with the box and from what I can see feels like a bit of a scam when you pay this much for a box like this.

ProductInfo.Features:
Free NVR management software included to manage up to 16 NVR devices
Two 3.5" SATA I/II disk slots, up to 2 x 1.5 TB
Compression: MJPEG/MPEG-4 part 2/H.264
Supports mobile viewing and 2-way audio
Gigabit Ethernet speeds up to 1000Mbps
ProductInfo.Name: LevelOne NVR-0104 4-Channel Network Video Recorder
